alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Christian; Crittenden; Hopkins; Lyon; Trigg; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 2:45PM EDT until July 18 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Crittenden County in western Kentucky... Christian County in south central Kentucky... Caldwell County in western Kentucky... Trigg County in western Kentucky... Hopkins County in northwestern Kentucky... Southwestern Webster County in northwestern Kentucky... Eastern Lyon County in western Kentucky... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 144 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rosiclare to Eddyville to near Turkey Bay to 6 miles north of Cottage Grove, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hopkinsville, Madisonville, Oak Grove, Princeton, Providence, Dawson Springs, Cadiz, Wranglers Campground, Fort Campbell, Land Between The Lakes Area, Clarksville, Earlington, Nortonville, Clay, Pembroke, Mortons Gap, Crofton, Olney, Creswell and Farmersville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Christian; Crittenden; Hopkins; Lyon; Trigg; Webster
